author: bodewig
msg: don't rely on archives to implement ZIP64 correctly when reading the data descriptor.  Works around a bug in java.util.ZipArchiveOutputStream of Java7, may be useful for other implementations as well.  COMPRESS-148

author: castagna
msg: It is recommended to specify the version of all plugins used, not doing sothreaten the stability of the build. Future Maven versions might no longer support building projects with missing plugin versions.

author: roger
msg: THRIFT-690 add new ApplicationExceptions (INTERNAL_ERROR, PROTOCOL_ERROR) to the following languages: as3, c_glib, cocoa, cpp, erl, hs, js, nodejs, ocaml, perl, py, rb

author: joern
msg: UIMA-2190 Applied patch that removes german comments in the cev plugins. Most of them were not useful and thereby removed. A few were translated. Additionally, the class TextFile2String was removed, because it wasn't used at all.
